Title: Full Dress
Description:
A traditional Arathi family meal involves displaying the various medals, awards, and mementos of the family. Given my mother's illustrious career, it's taking quite a while. 

Would you mind helping with some of the decorations?
ObjectivesText: Help the Steelstrikes decorate their house in Mereldar in preparation for the upcoming meal.
CompletionText: We have to get this meal right, my mother needs to unwind.
RewardText: Thank you. There's a lot of history in these items. It's good to see them on display.
